details.access_and_opening_times:
Disabled access

The Foreign & Commonwealth Office is keen to ensure that its buildings and services are fully accessible to disabled members of the public. Wherever possible, we have made our buildings and services accessible. Sometimes however, this is not possible due to security or other restrictions. In these situations we will endeavour to provide a service or access to a building in an alternative way to ensure equality of access for disabled people.

The British High Commission in Honiara is located on the first floor of the Heritage Park Hotel and there is no wheelchair access. Arrangements can be made to meet on the ground floor of the hotel.

If you need to visit us or use our services and feel that they may be inaccessible to you, please contact the Deputy High Commissioner on:

Telephone: +44 (677) 21705 or
Email: bhc@solomon.com.sb

Public holidays

The office will be closed on the following days in the calendar year for 2017:

  • Friday 2nd January - New Years Day

  • Friday 14th April - Good Friday

  • Monday 17th April - Easter Monday

  • Monday 1st May* - May Bank Holiday

  • Friday 26th May* - Privilege Holiday for Queens Birthday (UK)

  • Monday 29th May* - Spring Bank Holiday

  • Monday 5th June - Whit Monday

  • Friday 16th June - Queens Birthday

  • Thursday 7th July - SI Independence Day

  • Monday 28th August* - Summer Bank Holiday

  • Monday 25th December - Christmas Day

  • Monday 26th December - Boxing Day/ National Day of Thanksgiving

  • Tuesday 27th December - Privilege Holiday for Christmas Day/Boxing Day

Holidayâ€™s marked * are UK Public and Privilege Holiday
